title: BAD, JUST BAD
body:
Dear Riot,

i like how you do these events but i play a lot of normal games and am finding these draven heads, a bad decision due to there off putting and they are so annoying to play. if next time you do an event like this please have an off and on switch as its just hard to play the game at the moment and i feel i will have to wait till the 4th to come back and play the game i enjoy.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Official Kitten ,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=f7Ge6M1B,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-01T14:06:44.950+0000)
>
> off switch: play ranked :)

People who have never played ranked, and who just want to mess around (which is great fun in norms) are playing ranked and costing other players a lot of LP, which is great when you are against them but sucks if they are in your team.
Same man. I hate it. Isn't unlike Riot to force things though is it?
ah the new scapegoat for the bronzer populace!
